about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Junior Frontend Developer
about.description1: Frontend developer with experience in React, Tailwind CSS, Vite, Next.js and TypeScript. I have built modular and fully responsive interfaces, applying scalable state management with Zustand and efficient interactive flows.
about.description2: Among my featured projects are a dessert shopping cart, a browser extension-type management interface and a ticket generator with dynamic image loading, all focused on performance, clean architecture and development best practices.

items.title: Extension Manager
items.description: Web application to manage browser extensions with filter system (active/inactive), dark/light theme and dynamic states. Includes activation, deactivation and deletion functionalities with real-time data validation.

items.title: Dessert Shopping Cart
items.description: Dessert e-commerce with functional shopping cart. Implements Zustand for global state management, automatic total calculation, order confirmation and data persistence. Responsive design with adaptive images.

items.title: Ticket Generator
items.description: Ticket generator for conference events with form validation, image upload, personalized ticket preview and email confirmation. Modern interface with gradients and visual effects.

items.title: Medical Appointment System
items.description: Medical appointment system with user authentication, data validation registration, medical specialties selection and available schedules. Backend with Node.js, Express, MongoDB and bcrypt for security.

items.title: Personal Portfolio
items.description: Professional portfolio with typewriter-style text animations, smooth navigation, responsive hamburger menu and sections for work experience, projects and studies. Minimalist design with custom color system.
